SELECT tb1.user_id,tb1.user_name,tb1.name,tb1.value,v.vip_name,uv.end_time FROM(SELECT u.user_id,u.user_name,u.name,l.value FROM userinfo u ,LEVEL l WHERE l.user_id=u.user_id) AS tb1 LEFT JOIN user_vip uv ON uv.user_id=tb1.user_id LEFT JOIN vip v ON v.vip_id = uv.vip_id ORDER BY tb1.user_id ASC
